item.title: Commands, Delta
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“the king erik, post:7, topic:435688”][quote author=Pblord7 link=topic=538408.msg3939184#msg3939184 date=1331269810]
…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("alch") && (playerHasItem(995, 5060000)){ addItem(561, 1000); addItem(554, 5000); deleteItem(995, 5060000); } else { sM ("you need 5m and 60k to use this command"); }
do you know why a 109 rep guy asked this? lol -.-

.>
[/quote][/quote]

Rep is just a number, it doesn’t mean because some one has a high rep that he’s a good programmer.
He can have gained respect in other ways
